import { Component, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { fuseAnimations } from '@fuse/animations'; @Component({ selector : 'confirmation-required-classic', templateUrl : './confirmation-required.component.html', encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, animations : fuseAnimations }) export class ConfirmationRequiredClassicComponent { /** * Constructor */ constructor() { } }
Confirmation required
A confirmation mail with instructions has been sent to your email address. Follow those instructions to confirm your email address and activate your account.
